spell.name: Telekinetic Control
entries: Choose an object, weighing less than 5 lbs, that you can see within range.  You may animate this object with flying speed of 30 and lasts for the spell's duration.

On your turn, the animated object may attack any creatures of your choosing within a 10 foot radius. Any creature targeted by this attack must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
As a bonus action, you can move the object up to its max speed in any direction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
